Package com.composum.pages.commons.model

Class LanguageRoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.model.ModelWrapper
      • com.composum.pages.commons.model.GenericModel
        • com.composum.pages.commons.model.LanguageRoot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, com.composum.sling.core.SlingBean
    public class LanguageRoot
extends GenericModel
    the model of a resource which is the root of a language split in the context of the current page (the site with the configured site language set is used if no language split declared) assuming that a language split root page has siblings for the other languages of a site; the alternatives of the current page are searched in the siblings path relative to the language root
